title: Firefox Version 95
content: After installing Firefox Version 95. I found that I could not log-on to my online account at CVS Caremark. Apparently, that site will not permit access if attempted via Version 95. It is likely that the unique security improvements incorporated into that version are the source of the difficulty. I solved my access problem by switching to a different Browser, but I would prefer to return to Firefox, if they are able to find a way to allow CVS Caremark and perhaps other websites to log-on on again at some future date.
creator: ddembowski

title: Firefox update in the enterprise
content:
Multiple banks are removing Firefox due to vulnerabilities. They have found as I have told them multiple times that there is no centralized method to ensuring firefox remains up to date. The admx files from github do set the appautoupdate and backgroundappupdate to a value of 1 to indicate updates but all PCs are at different levels from 90.0 to 95.0 and I've found that even with the auto update switch on that many pcs do not auto update due to users leaving firefox up and ignoring the restart. The autoupdate task runs only if the user is logged on and that allows users to browse with an insecure version of Firefox that can lead to data breaches. CVEs lead to threats to exploit the CVE and that leads to risk that leads to data breaches. These CVEs are tracked by the NVD and this puts security in the hands of users instead of the business and the business has decided to remove firefox from their environments due to this fact.

I know mozilla is NFP but to maintain firefox in an enterprise environment, it need a better update process such as Google Chrome and Edge Chromium.

CVE-2021-38503 CVE-2021-38504 CVE-2021-38505 CVE-2021-38506 CVE-2021-38507 CVE-2021-38508 CVE-2021-38509 CVE-2021-38510

The above are current CVEs of High risk in one environment that has decided firefox will no longer be used.
creator: bruce92

title: Personalizar escalado en impresion
content:

Lo único que encuentro referente a este tema es la propiedad print.printer_NOMBREIMPRESORA.print_scaling y seria perfecta si solo lo necesitase para esta impresora pero necesito una "propiedad" que haga referencia a impresoras de manera "global" no a una concreta. No se si esto se puede hacer en firefox.

Gracias de antebrazo :P

title: couldn't load XPCOM Hatası
content: Sabah bilgisayarı açıp Firefox açmak istediğimde "couldn't load XPCOM Hatası" hatası ile karşılaştım, hata sonrası firefox açılıyor fakat tamamen işlevsiz hale geliyor hiçbir şey çalışmıyor. Bütün firefox verilerini, x86 x64 farketmeksizin, AppData, Temp, %Temp% vs dizinler dahil tamamen sildim. Ne bir profil ne bir kayıt bilgisi kaldı bilgisayarda. Fakat x86,x64, Developer, İngilizce Sürüm, Tor Browser yüklememe rağmen hepsinde aynı hatayı alıyorum ve tarayıcı çalışmıyor(Yönetici olarak çalıştırmayı da denedim). Windows 10 güncel sürümü kullanıyorum. Bu xpcom hatası ile ayda yılda bir karşılaşıyordum fakat üzerine kurulum yaparak düzeltiyordum, fakat şuan hiçbir şekilde firefox hiçbir sürümü çalışmıyor. Yardımlarınızı ve fikirlerinizi rica ediyorum.

title: Last checked input's css state persist after page reload
content:
Hi, I use this kind of css to manage the appearance of my input radio button state :

input ~ div { 

 background-color: #4a4a4a;  padding: 8px;  font-weight: 400;  height: 100%;  width: 100%;

} input:checked ~ div { 

 background-color: #363636;  padding: 8px;  font-weight: 400;  height: 100%;  width: 100%;

}

It works perfectly but when I reload the page, the css rule input:checked ~ div still apply to the last checked while it is no longer checked in the DOM…

for exemple I have 3 buttons : 1 - not checked 2 - not checked 3 - I checked this one, the rule input:checked ~ div is applied

If I reload the page : 1 - checked, return to default, works as designed, but the rule input:checked ~ div is not applied 2 - not checked 3 - not checked, but the rule input:checked ~ div is still applied

It's for commerce products variations, really annoying as when the customer reload the page, the displayed price is for the first button as designed, but it's the last button that is highlighted…

This issue is not present with other browsers…

Has anyone ever experienced this problem ? Thanks for your help
creator: llyomll

title: Firefox on Debian under ChromeOS -- Full Screen Button Fails
content:
The documentation says to use F11. F11 was removed from ChromeOS. The Full Screen Button on the keyboard will take Firefox out of full screen, but when you try to use it to put Firefox in Full Screen, the window gets slightly larger, and then goes back to its original size.

Other applications seem to be able to go to full screen using the Full Screen key that are running under Linux. For instance, gvim, thunar, meld, and gnucash all will go into full screen with the Full Screen Key.

title: Certain websites appear in some sort of "dark mode" when dark themes are enabled
content:
I've been using Elijah Lopez's Matte Black (Red) theme for months. Recently, I think because I added the ClearURLs extension or some other change, certain websites enter some sort of "dark mode" when accessed.

Websites that do this include Twitter, an independent blog, and Youtube.

The website appears normally with the default light theme enabled. In the second photo, the website appears in the "dark mode" with the black Firefox theme enabled.

I have deleted cookies and cache, reinstalled Firefox, and reinstalled Extensions. I think this problem only occurs with dark themes, and nothing else. The moment I change to dark theme, the problem comes back. It is strange because the dark theme was working just fine for months until recently.

How can I keep the dark theme, preferably the same Elijah Lopez's dark theme, while using websites normally and not in this weird "dark theme" style adaptation?

title: ATTENTION: All Firefox Employees/Volunteers/Big Shots/ Anyone who knows what they are doing!
content:
ATTENTION: All Firefox Employees/Volunteers/Big Shots/ Anyone who knows what they are doing!

I can see why so many of your clients are leaving FF and you're begging for donations. I will be the next one if someone doesn't help me. AND DO NO respond to me with your computer IT LINGO. I am NOT AN IT person, I don't understand most of your ever-so-helpful (NOT) articles. Speak to me as though I know NOTHING about computers, even though I have used them for 40 years. MOZILLA you need to learn then teach your volunteers how to access my computer walk me through all of the problems I continue to have. I DID DOWNLOAD the latest v. 95, however, yesterday I downloaded a file and suddenly my OLD FF PAGE showed up and that is where the download went. HOW does that happen? Trying to get help is another anxiety-ridden experience. This is the 3rd page I've been on to get SOMEONE'S ATTENTION! I, personally, haven't found FireFox to be user-friendly as so many others seem to feel. AND, if you start using BING, I will be gone, NO if, ands, or buts. Bing is a piece of crap! I've tried numerous times to get it off MS Edge only for it to appear again. MS may think it's the greatest thing since sliced bread, but it isn't, even their format is UGLY!

I thought I finally got the hang of TABS...open tab, select website or whatever you want to open, then you don't lose all the other TABS that are open. HOWEVER, when one is moving along at lightning speed and happens to forget to open a TAB, that's when I want to SCREAM at the top of my lungs because now the other tab I opened is GONE! I'm sure I must be doing something WRONG, NO DOUBT, then teach me how to do it RIGHT!

NO MORE WRITTEN ARTICLES, THEY ARE A WASTE OF MY TIME! You may think you've written them in the clearest possible way, but you HAVEN'T. Again, if your audience is for IT people then MAYBE, just maybe they might understand what you've written, but I DO NOT!

That is the SINGLE MOST ANNOYING habit that every company has. SPEAKING IN COMPUTEREZE. I have worked in the medical field for many years, and the medical field has it's own terminology, words, diagnoses, codes, etc. and if I were to somehow use these words when messaging you, you would be CLUELESS! AND you wouldn't even bother to figure out what I'm asking or how to respond. Specific fields in this country have their own language. My husband worked in Aerospace for years and when he would describe to me what he was working on, it was Greek to me. The list goes on and on.

WELL, that's what you do now! You can pat yourselves on the back for all of your brilliant directional articles, but many of us out here in the real world are not patting you on the back.

Get your stuff together, take this email seriously, and perhaps you won't keep losing customers.

YOU NEED A SPECIFIC LOG-IN PAGE. When I open Firefox and go to the 3 bars I HAVE TO THINK I AM LOGGED IN. There is my Email address and if I click on that account I have many options. Two of which are manage account with my email address again, and SIGN OUT. I have to be signed in to sign OUT, right? AND if I have the correct version there should be NO REASON to EVER SEE my OLD FF home page, RIGHT? Then, why do I? It is great that you are trying to make your browser the safest browser on the market, but if people CAN NOT get legitimate answers in language understood by ALL, no computereze, then WHAT IS THE POINT?

And so much for the SCREENSHOT link. How does that work. I have the link on my Toolbar and it states, "Take a Screenshot" and that's what I did, because I wanted to show you some pages. BUT where did the screenshot go??? I looked through BROWSE, couldn't find it there in my files.

DO NOT make educated guesses, because that is what you do now. GUESS!! I guarantee that your educated guesses are WRONG!

Most Sincerely, Rhonda Caywood
creator: Rhonda_89

title: Firefox Monitor; Breach Resolved?
content:
A recent breach might explain why I have about 600+ spam emails this month. Plus an unusual number missed by Gmail's usually pretty good filter.

The main problem is with Gravatar (www.gravatar.com), somehow associated with WordPress.com. ?? It doesn't seem to allow changes to either email address or password, unless I overlooked something... Options available are to Hide and/or Close the account, and I did both. Trying to sign in again still shows my email addy, so I'm not sure that it has been resolved quite yet. Oh and.. There I can change the email address, but there's no point in being spammed all over again from a different direction.

Less of a problem is the 500px site. Some nice photographs in there, but I haven't visited in years (probably). My account there has been deactivated, in the meantime, and, judging by the amount of spam until the last month or so, I'd guess that one is resolved. And, btw.. I do use unique passwords.

I'm actually very grateful for this service. I'm just not sure I managed to fix either breach. The other thing is that Gmail places the notifications under Promotions tab instead of Primary or Updates tabs. Not sure what I can do to fix that....

Many Thanks,

Colin.

P.S. Please make it easier to find how to EDIT posts.
creator: colincv
